extends com.mingsoft.bbs.action.BaseAction

    • 方法详细资料

      • delete

        @RequestMapping(value="/delete",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public void delete(@ModelAttribute
                                      com.mingsoft.bbs.entity.SubjectEntity subject,
                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        用户删除评论
        参数:
        commentIds - 评论编号 多个编号用逗号隔开 例如:1,2,3,4
        返回

        {code:"错误编码",
        result:"true｜false",
        resultMsg:"错误信息"
        }

      • list

        @RequestMapping(value="/list",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public void list(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        用户评论列表
        返回

        {count:"错误编码",
        list:{"count":1,"list":[{"commentBasicId":被评论信息编号,"commentCommentId":父评论编号,"commentId":评论编号,"commentPoints":评论分数,"commentTime":"时间"}]} }

      • save

        @RequestMapping(value="/save",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public void save(@ModelAttribute
                                    com.mingsoft.comment.entity.CommentEntity comment,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        用户提交评论
        参数:
        comment - comment参数包含字段信息参考：
        commentContent 评论内容
        commentBasicId 评论帖子编号
        commentCommentId 评论的父评论编号
        返回

        {code:"错误编码",
        result:"true｜false",
        resultMsg:"错误信息"
        }
